name: IRCC November 2017
description: This style changes the display:none function of Canadian immigration and citizenship forms to display:block to enable printing of form pages.
additional_info: The reason for this style is described here:  https://ofaolain.com/blog/2017/11/28/use-stylish-to-make-immigration-form-printable/  Chrome users should omit the @-moz-document line and the two braces.
